SpaRED
  • API
  • View page source

API

Import SpaRED:

import spared

Processing

processing.get_slide_from_collection(...)

Retrieve a slide from a collection of slides.

processing.get_exp_frac(adata)

Compute the expression fraction for all genes.

processing.get_glob_exp_frac(adata)

Compute the global expression fraction for all genes.

processing.filter_dataset(adata, param_dict)

Perform complete filtering pipeline of a slide collection.

processing.tpm_normalization(organism, ...)

Normalize expression using TPM normalization.

processing.log1p_transformation(adata, ...)

Perform \(\log_2(x+1)\) transformation

processing.get_spatial_neighbors(adata, ...)

Compute neighbors dictionary for an AnnData object.

processing.clean_noise(collection, ...)

Remove noise with median filter.

processing.combat_transformation(adata, ...)

Perform batch correction with ComBat

processing.get_deltas(adata, from_layer, ...)

Get expression deltas from the mean.

processing.compute_moran(adata, from_layer, ...)

Compute Moran's I statistic for each gene.

processing.filter_by_moran(adata, n_keep, ...)

Filter prediction genes by Moran's I.

processing.add_noisy_layer(adata, ...)

Add an artificial noisy layer.

processing.process_dataset(adata, param_dict)

Perform complete processing pipeline.

processing.compute_patches_embeddings_and_predictions(adata)

Compute embeddings or predictions for patches.

processing.get_pretrain_dataloaders(adata[, ...])

Get dataloaders for pretraining an image encoder.

processing.get_graphs_one_slide(adata, ...)

Get neighbor graphs for a single slide.

processing.get_sin_cos_positional_embeddings(...)

Get positional encodings for a neighbor graph.

processing.get_graphs(adata, n_hops, layer)

Get graphs for all the slides in a dataset.

processing.get_graph_dataloaders(adata[, ...])

Get dataloaders for the graphs of a dataset.

Metrics

metrics.get_metrics(gt_mat, pred_mat, mask)

Get general regression metrics

Plotting

visualize.refine_plotting_slides_str(...)

Assure plotting slides are on the dataset.

visualize.get_plotting_slides_adata(...)

Get list of adatas to plot

visualize.plot_all_slides(dataset, ...)

Plot all the whole slide images

visualize.get_exp_frac(adata)

Get expression fraction for each gene

visualize.get_glob_exp_frac(adata)

Get global expression fraction for each gene

visualize.plot_exp_frac(param_dict, dataset, ...)

Plot heatmap of expression fraction

visualize.plot_histograms(processed_adata, ...)

Plot filtering histograms

visualize.plot_random_patches(dataset, ...)

Plot random set of patches

visualize.visualize_moran_filtering(...[, top])

Plot the most or least auto-correlated genes

visualize.visualize_gene_expression(...)

Plot specific gene expression

visualize.compute_dim_red(adata, from_layer)

Compute embeddings and clusters

visualize.plot_clusters(dataset, param_dict, ...)

Plot clusters spatially

visualize.plot_mean_std(dataset, ...)

Plot mean and std of all genes

visualize.plot_data_distribution_stats(...)

Plot dataset's general stats

visualize.plot_mean_std_partitions(dataset, ...)

Plot mean and std of genes by data split

visualize.plot_tests(patch_scale, ...)

Plot all quality control plots
